info.title: EXPOCAD
info.description: This service interfaces with live EXPOCAD event data.  Please use PUT, POST, and DELETE operations with discretion. Keep authorization codes private. If your code has been compromised, contact tech@expocad.com immediately.

get.summary: Get Specific Booth

parameters.description: Organization Account use for EXPOCAD

put.description: Unrents the specified booth in the supplied event.

EXPOCAD allows for a booth to be placed on hold to either an existing Exhibitor (by Id) or to a temporary Exhibitor (by Name). Choose one parameter or the other -  'ExhibitorId' or 'ExhibitorName'. If both paramerters are supplied, the hold will default to the Exhibitor ID.

put.description: Converts the specified rented booth to a booth on hold to the same exhibitor in the supplied event.
Rents the specified held booth to the held exhibitor in the supplied event. This operation will fail if the booth is currently held to a temporary exhibitor.

get.summary: Get a collection of transactions
get.description:
Parameters startDate and endDate allow you to filter by a date range.
If you do decide to filter by a range, you must supply at least one valid date.

Valid dates are in the format of: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.description: Organization Account use for EXPOCAD
parameters.name: ClientName
parameters.x-ms-summary: EXPOCAD Account

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The database name of the EXPOCAD event
parameters.x-ms-summary: The database name of the EXPOCAD event

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Filter transactions on and after this date. YYYY-MM-DD
parameters.x-ms-summary: Filter transactions on and after this date. YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Filter transactions on and before this date. YYYY-MM-DD
parameters.x-ms-summary: Filter transactions on and before this date. YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: exhibitorId
parameters.description: An exhibitor ID to filter by
parameters.x-ms-summary: An exhibitor ID to filter by

parameters.name: boothNumber
parameters.description: A booth number to filter by
parameters.x-ms-summary: A booth number to filter by

parameters.name: expocadUser
parameters.description: An expocad user to filter by
parameters.x-ms-summary: An expocad user to filter by

parameters.name: glCode
parameters.description: A general ledger code to filter by
parameters.x-ms-summary: A general ledger code to filter by

parameters.name: reversedFilter
parameters.description: Filter by reversed transactions. Default includes all transactions
parameters.x-ms-summary: Filter by reversed transactions. Default includes all transactions

get.summary: Returns the master list of requestable items
get.description: Will return items that match either the glCode or the transactionCode. For TotalNumberAvailable, 0 = Unlimited

parameters.description: Organization Account use for EXPOCAD
parameters.name: ClientName
parameters.x-ms-summary: EXPOCAD Account

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The database name of the EXPOCAD event
parameters.x-ms-summary: The database name of the EXPOCAD event

parameters.name: glCode
parameters.description: The item code of a particular Request Item.  If omitted, returns all available Request Items
parameters.x-ms-summary: The item code of a Request Item. If omitted, returns all available Request Items

parameters.name: transactionCode
parameters.description: The transaction code of a particular Request Item
parameters.x-ms-summary: The transaction code of a particular Request Item

get.summary: Get a list of all assigned request items

parameters.description: Organization Account use for EXPOCAD
parameters.name: ClientName
parameters.x-ms-summary: EXPOCAD Account

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The database name of the EXPOCAD event
parameters.x-ms-summary: The database name of the EXPOCAD event

parameters.name: exhibitorId
parameters.description: The Id of an Exhibitor
parameters.x-ms-summary: The Id of an Exhibitor

parameters.name: invoiceNumber
parameters.description: The number of an Invoice
parameters.x-ms-summary: The number of an Invoice

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Only items on or after startDate are returned
parameters.x-ms-summary: Only items on or after startDate are returned

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Only items on or before endDate are returned
parameters.x-ms-summary: Only items on or before endDate are returned

parameters.name: booth
parameters.description: Only items assigned to this booth number are return
parameters.x-ms-summary: Only items assigned to this booth number are return

parameters.name: glCode
parameters.description: The item code of a Master Request Item
parameters.x-ms-summary: The item code of a Master Request Item

parameters.name: transactionCode
parameters.description: Only items with this transactionCode are returned
parameters.x-ms-summary: Only items with this transactionCode are returned

get.description: Returns a list of all assigned request items. If any parameter is omitted, that filter will not be applied.

parameters.description: The Id of an Exhibitor. If omitted, this filter is not applied
parameters.x-ms-summary: The Id of an Exhibitor. If omitted, this filter is not applied

parameters.name: DepositId
parameters.description: The depositId of a payment.  If omitted, this filter is not applied
parameters.x-ms-summary: The depositId of a payment.  If omitted, this filter is not applied

parameters.name: InvoiceNumber
parameters.description: The number of a particular Invoice.  If omitted, this filter is not applied
parameters.x-ms-summary: The number of a particular Invoice.  If omitted, this filter is not applied

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description: The start date of a payment range.  If omitted, this filter is not applied

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: The end date of a payment range.  If omitted, this filter is not applied

parameters.name: PaymentTypeCategory
parameters.description: The type a payment.  If omitted, this filter is not applied
parameters.x-ms-summary: The type a payment.  If omitted, this filter is not applied

get.description: Returns list of payments in the Expocad Event.For Non-Credit Card Payments, The Check Number is returned in the CCLast4 field.
